data.Sentence_cn: 飞机误点了，侦探们在机场等了整整一上午。
data.Sentence: The plane was late and detectives were waiting at the airport all morning.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们正期待从南非来的一个装着钻石的贵重包裹。
data.Sentence: They were expecting a valuable parcel of diamonds from South Africa.

data.Sentence_cn: 数小时以前，有人向警方报告，说有人企图偷走这些钻石。
data.Sentence: A few hours earlier, someone had told the police that thieves would try to steal the diamonds.

data.Sentence_cn: 当飞机到达时，一些侦探等候在主楼内，另一些侦探则守候在停机坪上。
data.Sentence: When the plane arrived, some of the detectives were waiting inside the main building while others were waiting on the airfield.

data.Sentence_cn: 有两个人把包裹拿下飞机，进了海关。
data.Sentence: Two men took the parcel off the plane and carried it into the Customs House.

data.Sentence_cn: 这时两个侦探把住门口，另外两个侦探打开了包裹。
data.Sentence: While two detectives were keeping guard at the door, two others opened the parcel.

data.Sentence_cn: 令他们吃惊的是，那珍贵的包裹里面装的全是石头和沙子！
data.Sentence: To their surprise, the precious parcel was full of stones and sand!
